Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 182 of 261 1343
LC6Cmax5 McHugh - cross
1 A. Correct.
2 Q. So even though the account is under the name of Ghislaine Maxwell, this statement can't tell us whether Ghislaine Maxwell actually approved or had anything to do with that transaction?
3 A. Yes.
4 Q. And now I want you to look at that same exhibit starting at page 5.
5 Q. The same statement, but I want you to now go to page 5, which we didn't look at on direct examination. Do you see that page?
6 A. I do.
7 Q. That has a canceled check on it; right?
8 A. Yes, a check date.
9 Q. And let's go to the next page, page 6. That also has a series of paid checks on that page; right?
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. And that's typical with account statements, when they're sent to the account holder, they include the checks that were drawn on the account for that month; right?
12 A. Especially at that time, yes.
13 Q. So these reflect checks that were drawn on the account in that month in the statement of June of 2007; right?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. Now let's look at just the first three of those checks on
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018519

1 A. Correct.
2 Q. So even though the account is under the name of Ghislaine Maxwell, this statement can't tell us whether Ghislaine Maxwell actually approved or had anything to do with that transaction?
3 A. Yes.
4 Q. And now I want you to look at that same exhibit starting at page 5.
5 Q. The same statement, but I want you to now go to page 5, which we didn't look at on direct examination. Do you see that page?
6 A. I do.
7 Q. That has a canceled check on it; right?
8 A. Yes, a check date.
9 Q. And let's go to the next page, page 6. That also has a series of paid checks on that page; right?
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. And that's typical with account statements, when they're sent to the account holder, they include the checks that were drawn on the account for that month; right?
12 A. Especially at that time, yes.
13 Q. So these reflect checks that were drawn on the account in that month in the statement of June of 2007; right?
14 A. Yes.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript from a case involving Ghislaine Maxwell. The text is mostly printed, with no visible handwriting or stamps. The footer contains a reference number and the name of the reporting agency.
